Text: item Cc PST Its clear the Ebay made the error in this matter They are not being forthcoming about it however Iam continuing to communicate with them but they are being less that honest I am not going to pay what I did not bid Since Ebay is the culprit here we are caught in the middle Id refrain from leaving any negative at my site until this matter can be resolved since I would have to respond in kind

Re What are you talking about PST IF YOU OPENED MY ATTACHMENT YOULL SEE MY BID WAS NOT Original Message From To Sent Tuesday January PM Subject RE What are you talking about I would suggest you take it up with EBay See my attachment regarding EBays policy on Non Paying Bidder I have tried to contact the person that you outbid the person that bid He has not responded I would suggest you try and contact him to have him pay for the item at his highest bid I have bid on items before on EBay and it clearly asks you twice to confirm your bidding amount I would be more than willing to change your payment if the price got way out of wack is actually cheaper than some of the balls were going for this weekend I hope the person that bid will respond and get you off the hook Otherwise EBay will have to intervene on your behalf I guess it is possible their system messed up but it looks like you approved a bad bid Sorry Good luck PL NonPayingBidder Final Value Fee Credit Request Program This is your place to learn about eBays NonPaying Bidder Program and supporting features Start here if youre a Seller who has a nonpaying bidder and would like a Final Value Fee credit for your unsold item eBay user who is interested in knowing more about what happens when high bidders dont pay NonPaying bidders face the following consequences through this program First offense warning Second offense warning Third offense Indefinite Suspension helpbasicsgindefinitesuspensionhtml What to do if youre a seller with a nonpaying bidder Step Explanation Time Frame Contact Contact each other after your listing has ended Like you each other buyers can have emergencies or computer problems Your high bidder may not be able to respond to you right away for baycomawcgilegitimate reasons eBayISAPIdll UserInformati onRequest Generally within business days is a good idea Payment Send a payment reminder email to your winning bidder You can Reminder customize the email baycomawcgi eBayISAPIdll myebayportal After days but not past days of your listings close NonPaying File a NonPaying Bidder Alert if you still dont get a response Bidder Alert or if you feel you may not receive payment Remember In order to collect your Final Value Fee credit you must complete a baycomawcgiNonPaying Bidder Alert Form on time eBay then will send an eBayISAPIdllemail to you and your high bidder Your high bidder will be NPBComplaintFreminded to pay you and informed of the consequences if no orm payment is sent After days but not past days of your listings close Request Request your Final Value Fee credit if youve a Filed a your Final NonPaying Bidder Alert days or more after your listing has Value Fee ended and b Tried unsuccessfully to resolve things with your credit bidder days after youve filed the NonPaying Bidder Alert Form above Your refund will be credited to your account within baycomawcgi hours eBayISAPIdll CreditRequest Within days of your listings close Worked things out with the buyer If you have filed the Final Value Fee credit you may use the NonPaying Bidder Warning Removal awcgieBayISAPIdllRemoveNPBWarningShow to remove the warning for the bidder Within days of your listings close Special note about Dutch Auctions They work the same as other auctions with one exception You may file a NonPaying Bidder Alert Form only once per auction for as many bidders as necessary That is you cannot go back and file additional Alerts if you have more nonpaying bidders from the same auction Special note to bidders If you are a bidder and believe you received an unfair warning you may appeal it by using eBays NonPaying Bidder Appeal Form baycomawcgi eBayISAPIdll SendQueryEmai lShowsubject npb Warnings will remain on your record until they are successfully appealed Visit our NonPaying Bidder Frequently Asked Questions ebaycomhelp basicsfnpbh tml Original Message From LAURIN HAYES ENRON Sent Tuesday January AM To Love Phillip M Cc eBay Customer Support Subject Re What are you talking about NO IAM NOT GOING TO PAY PLEASE EXAMINE THE ATTACHMENT AND YOULL SEE WHY Original Message From Love Phillip M PhillipM NRONcom To Sent Tuesday January AM Subject What are you talking about I have you down for plus shipping not I show that you bid at and at There was no bid for listed at all I am sorry if you did not mean to bid but it is hardly out of the range these balls were selling this weekend for If your winning bid was or higher I could understand your complaint and we could make an adjustment but is not an unreasonable amount Please let me know if you are planning on paying the I will pay shipping if you use PayPal If not I need to contact EBay for resolution I need a response as soon as possible Thanks PL This email is the property of Enron Corp andor
